entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:53 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:53 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:53 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
